input.sentences: today we went to the flower market so i could get my girlfriend a v-day gift . at the market we passed a pet store with beautiful birds .
here is a picture of the bird i liked the most . it had a great orange color .
we the decided to walk through the flower showcase .
one of my girlfriends favorite flowers are orchids .
so i bought some orchids with these 2 little cute bears . i think she will like them !
output.sentences: Going to the market we passed a pet store and decided to go inside.
This poor little orange bird is looking for a new home.
We kept on walking and looking at all the showcases.
we saw some very pretty orchids they are my girlfriends favorite flower.
I bought them with for her in a very cute setting with a little teddy bear.
